snippet: Some slightly contrarian thoughts that may offer comfort to the long-term investor, when ignoring the wild swings in the market gets difficult.
lead_paragraph: Some slightly contrarian thoughts that may offer comfort to the long-term investor, when ignoring the wild swings in the market gets difficult.
